text: Since then, we've been able to expand the size of the program, funding dozens of training centers in 27 different states and changing countless lives. I'm proud to continue advocating for this important program that helps America's wounded vets!

html: Sadly, I also learned that many of the nonprofits that train service dogs for veterans are underfunded. Veterans who need dogs often cannot get them due to financial constraints. To help fix the problem, I created a Wounded Warrior Service Dogs competitive grant program in 2014.
text: Sadly, I also learned that many of the nonprofits that train service dogs for veterans are underfunded. Veterans who need dogs often cannot get them due to financial constraints. To help fix the problem, I created a Wounded Warrior Service Dogs competitive grant program in 2014.

html: I first learned how important service dogs for vets are in 2013, when visiting the National Education for Assistance Dog Services (@NEADSdogs). I heard amazing stories about how service dogs can help change the lives of vets w/ physical disabilities & post-traumatic stress.

html: #FlorenceNC safety tips: - STAY INDOORS. Do not venture out during the storm. - Do NOT drive or walk through stagnant or moving floodwaters. - If your power goes out, do NOT operate gas powered generators or charcoal grills in or near your home. - Have your emergency kit ready!
text:
#FlorenceNC safety tips:
- STAY INDOORS. Do not venture out during the storm.
- Do NOT drive or walk through stagnant or moving floodwaters. 
- If your power goes out, do NOT operate gas powered generators or charcoal grills in or near your home.
- Have your emergency kit ready!
